snippet: Republicans condemned President Obama’s comparison of the atrocities of the Islamic State to the bloodshed in the name of Christianity in centuries past.
abstract: Pres Obama equates atrocities of Islamic State to bloodshed committed by Christians in centuries past, angering many conservatives.
lead_paragraph: Republicans condemned President Obama’s comparison of the atrocities of the Islamic State to the bloodshed in the name of Christianity in centuries past.

headline.main: Critics Seize On Obama’s ISIS Remarks at Prayer Breakfast
headline.print_headline: Obama Is Assailed for Remarks on ISIS and Christianity
